column1: * Commercial solid fuels only, i.e. bituminous coal and anthracite (hard coal), and lignite and brown (sub-bituminous) coal, and other commercial solid fuels. Includes coal produced for Coal-to-Liquids and Coal-to-Gas transformations.
USSR includes Georgia and the Baltic States.
# Excludes Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania prior to 1985 and Croatia and Slovenia prior to 1990.
Notes: Annual changes and shares of total are calculated using million tonnes figures.
Growth rates are adjusted for leap years.
